attributes.action: Bank holiday if England win the European Championship
attributes.additional_details: Because it would be the most unproductive day in the history of Britain due to the all night celebrations that would occur and after 18 months people deserve to celebrate and be happy.
attributes.background: Announce a bank holiday on Monday 12th if England win on Wednesday.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
